headline: How Investors Are Reacting To Akamai Technologies (AKAM) Expanding Its AI Cloud And Payments Security Ecosystem
summary: In December 2025, Akamai Technologies launched ISV Catalyst, a referral-based partner program to help independent software vendors build, market, and sell AI-ready, cloud-native solutions on its distributed cloud platform, and announced a collaboration with Visa to secure agentic commerce using Visa’s Trusted Agent Protocol integrated with Akamai’s edge-based security tools. Together, these moves extend Akamai’s ecosystem on both the application and payments fronts, potentially deepening its...

headline: Cloud AI Update - Akamai Accelerates ISV Growth with New Partner Program
summary: Akamai Technologies has launched ISV Catalyst, a new partner program aimed at accelerating growth for independent software vendors (ISVs) on its globally distributed cloud platform. This initiative is designed to support ISVs in creating, marketing, and selling cloud-native solutions, particularly those involving artificial intelligence and multicloud capabilities. By offering no referral fees for ISVs during the first year and various promotional opportunities, the program aims to lower...

headline: Managed Domain Name System (DNS) Industry Trends and Strategic Profiles (2025-2030) Featuring Akamai Technologies, Alibaba Cloud, Cloudflare, IBM NS1 Connect, No-IP, Verisign and More
summary: Market opportunities include the rising demand for secure and high-performing DNS solutions driven by digital expansion, cloud adoption, and increasing cyber threats. Innovations like AI-driven traffic routing and blockchain enhance DNS security, while regulations encourage investment in scalable solutions.
